Title: Bhopal: Customers flee as masked men armed with swords, bats vandalise cafe | Watch
description: A video of the incident has gone viral, in which the attackers can be seen causing extensive damage to Magic Spot Cafe, located on Hoshangabad Road in Bhopal’s Misrod area, as customers scramble to flee.

Title: Delhi pollution: SC asks CAQM to consider directing NCR schools to postpone sports competitions
description: A bench comprising Chief Justice B R Gavai and Justice K Vinod Chandran said the issue of severe air pollution crisis in Delhi-National Capital Region needed a pro-active approach and the top court should hear the case to monitor the development on a monthly basis.

Title: Viral video shows dancer beaten at Haryana pre-wedding after objecting to guest's advances
description: The attack occurred on November 16 in Haryana's Pachgaon village during a performance. According to the footage, a man, who is seen holding currency notes, brought his hand uncomfortably close to one of the performers.

Title: WATCH: Delhi man kisses girlfriend from moving car roof in dangerous stunt, police take action
description: The video, shot from a nearby vehicle, shows the individual clambering onto the roof of a white hatchback as it navigates a busy road.

Title: Ex-armyman shoots self after killing wife, mother-in-law in Punjab’s Gurdaspur
description: Gurdaspur senior superintendent of police (SSP) Aditya rushed to the local Improvement Trust Colony No. 7 on the outskirts of the town with nearly 200 police personnel on being informed about the murders and the threat by Gurpreet Singh to go on a killing spree.

Title: Ricin terror plot accused attacked in Sabarmati jail; inmates punched him to ‘flaunt patriotism’, say police
description: The incident happened less than 12 hours after prime accused in the alleged Ricin terror plot and two other suspects were moved to Ahmedabad’s Sabarmati Central Jail under judicial custody.

Title: Scams shake TTD and Tirupati temple: How Andhra’s holiest shrine is battling frauds - four key cases
description: One of the biggest controversies in recent times at the Tirupati temple is the adulterated ghee scam. This involves the supply of fake and impure ghee, used in making the famous Tirupati Laddu prasadam, which is offered to devotees as holy food.

Title: Mumbai-Ahmedabad bullet train: Civil works on Surat-Bilimora section fully done, 2027 launch on track
description: The 508-km Mumbai-Ahmedabad High-Speed Rail (MAHSR) corridor will connect Maharashtra, Gujarat and the Union Territory of Dadra & Nagar Haveli once completed.

Title: Sabarimala rush forces new regulations: Daily entry capped at 1 lakh, spot bookings limited to 20k
description: The decision came after visuals showed devotees tightly packed near the sacred 18 steps, long delays on the Pamba–Sannidhanam route, and complaints about lack of drinking water in the queues.

Title: 'Smoke from Punjab says Connaught Place is my address. What a joke!': Bhagwant Mann on Delhi pollution
description: The Punjab CM claimed that the state hadn't even started harvesting paddy when Delhi's AQI soared to 400.

Title: Al-Falah University collected Rs 415 cr by misleading students and parents: ED
description: Al Falah University came under scrutiny after three doctors associated with it were identified as suspects in the November 10 Red Fort blast.

Title: Delhi's Khan Market ranks as 24th most expensive high-street globally: report
description: Khan Market was 23rd most expensive retail location globally in last year's ranking. Nevertheless, Khan Market remains India's most expensive high street.

Title: Faridkot coldest in Punjab at 6.5 deg Celsius, Narnaul in Haryana at 6.8
description: According to the Met department, on Wednesday, Bathinda experienced a cold night at 7.8 degrees Celsius, while Gurdaspur recorded a minimum temperature of 8 degrees Celsius.

Title: From Delhi's deep chill to Mumbai's cool spell: Mapping India's unexpected November cold wave
description: The IMD has confirmed that minimum temperatures have remained below normal nearly every day this month, a pattern expected to persist, setting new temperature records.

Title: Mumbai weather update: Cool morning turns hazy as city's AQI reaches unhealthy 275
description: Mumbai weather update: The India Meteorological Department (IMD) reported clear skies and a moderate daytime high of around 33 degrees Celsius, with the pleasant conditions expected to persist overnight.

Title: Several Al-Falah University faculty members, locals vanish after massive terror-links crackdown
description: The core of the new probe, as initiated by the DGP, will focus on how a cell of radicalised doctors was able to operate from within the university grounds, raising serious questions about campus security and oversight.

Title: 'Drishyam'-style murder: Missing Bengaluru techie found buried inside house in Andhra; cousin, aide held
description: The body of 34-year-old software engineer Shrinath K was exhumed from a residence in Kuppam, in Andhra Pradesh’s Chittoor district on November 16. According to police, the victim, an Andhra native, was murdered by his cousin Prabhakar, 39.

Title: Karnataka bets big: A second airport, AI city and Rs 1.5 lakh crore overhaul for Bengaluru's future
description: The revelations came at the inauguration of the Bengaluru Tech Summit 2025, where Chief Minister Siddaramaiah launched the Karnataka Space Technology, IT and Startup Policy 2025-30.

Title: Delhi: Class 10 student dies after jumping from Rajendra Nagar Metro Station
description: The incident was reported around 3 pm, following which a team reached the spot and found the boy critically injured. He was immediately taken to a nearby hospital in Delhi, where doctors declared him dead.

Title: Delhi riots were 'choreographed' conspiracy for ‘regime change’, Umar Khalid among orchestrators: Police
description: The sensational claims were made as the police vigorously defended the denial of bail under the stringent Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act (UAPA) to six individuals.

Title: Delhi air worsens again as AQI shoots up to 386: 16 stations hit ‘severe’ mark
description: Delhi AQI: Out of 39 monitoring stations in Delhi-NCR, 16 locations recorded AQI levels above 400, categorised as “severe.” Wazirpur emerged as the most polluted spot with an AQI of 446, followed by Bawana at 444 and Jahangirpuri at 442.

Title: Sabarimala pilgrims alert: Karnataka issues urgent advisory over deadly 'brain-eating' amoeba
description: The government has requested all pilgrims to follow the guidelines strictly to ensure a safe Sabarimala pilgrimage season.

Title: Mumbai Airport to remain shut for 6 hours on Nov 20; check timings
description: Mumbai’s Chhatrapati Shivaji Maharaj International Airport issued a passenger advisory on Tuesday stating that the scheduled closure is crucial for maintaining safety, operational reliability and compliance with international aviation standards.

Title: 'Brainwashed' bomber Dr Umar Mohammad parroted ISI martyrdom line, say experts
description: Experts noted that Umar Nabi avoided staring directly into the camera and spoke in a manner that pretended to be thoughtful.

Title: CNG supply to Mumbai, neighbouring areas restored after two days of disruption
description: The Mahanagar Gas Limited (MGL) said the disruption began on Sunday after third-party damage to GAIL's main supply pipeline inside the Rashtriya Chemicals and Fertilisers (RCF) compound hit gas flow to MGL's City Gate Station at Wadala.

Title: Delhi Police books 250 people in verification drive after Red Fort blast
description: Red Fort blast triggered by a suicide bomber, which followed the busting of a white-collar terror module spanning Jammu and Kashmir, Haryana and Uttar Pradesh, claimed 15 lives and injured several others.

Title: Delhi blast: Rented i10 traced as 5th vehicle in terror plot; cops say it ferried explosives across NCR
description: Meanwhile, a photograph circulated on social media on Monday showing Dr Shahid and Dr Muzammil standing next to a Maruti Brezza, the same vehicle seized by the police and bought by Shahid on September 25. Officers confirmed the picture is real.

Title: Karnataka govt spending over Rs 1 lakh cr to improve infrastructure in Bengaluru city: Shivakumar
description: Karnataka Deputy Chief Minister D K Shivakumar, who is also the Minister incharge of Bengaluru Development, was speaking at the inaugural of the 28th edition of Bengaluru Tech Summit 2025.

Title: Red Fort blast: Video glorifying suicide attack found in suicide bomber's phone
description: The critical evidence was unearthed after the detention and subsequent interrogation of Zahoor Illahi, brother of Umar who was driving the explosive-laden car that blasted outside Red Fort on November 10 killing 15 people, officials said on Tuesday.

Title: GRAP-IV not invoked in Delhi-NCR, clarifies CAQM - 'misleading information'
description: In a statement, the Commission for Air Quality Management (CAQM) said some news channels and digital platforms were circulating “misleading information” that the highest tier of emergency restrictions had been imposed in Delhi-NCR.

Title: Bengaluru–Tumakuru Metro: Tejasvi Surya calls project 'nightmare' as BMRCL floats tender for DPR
description: In a pointed post on X, BJP MP Tejasvi Surya argued that Bengaluru–Tumakuru Metro project’s enormous cost and relatively low operating speed make it unsuitable for long-distance travel.

Title: Temperatures dip 3-4 degrees Celsius below normal across Rajasthan, Sikar's Fatehpur coldest
description: Many parts of the state recorded minimum temperatures 3-4 degrees Celsius below normal, the Met centre said. The weather remained dry across the state during the 24 hours ending Tuesday morning.

Title: In pics: Long queues, empty roads as CNG crisis paralyses Mumbai
description: Mumbai CNG crisis: While domestic piped natural gas supplies have been prioritised and remain unaffected, the commercial supply of Compressed Natural Gas (CNG) has been severely hit.

Title: Bengaluru Metro gets bomb threat: Man warns of blast ‘if ex-wife tortured’; claims to be ‘terrorist-like person’
description: According to officials, the email claimed that Bengaluru Metro staff were mentally harassing the sender’s former wife, identified as Padmini.

Title: Maharashtra: 899 farmers committed suicide in Marathwada during January-October
description: Minister of State for Agriculture Ashish Jaiswal said Maharashtra government is seriously addressing the issue and has increased the spending on dedicated schemes and incentives to Rs 1 lakh crore.

Title: Delhi blast probe: Families flee Nuh amid frequent police visits to room rented by Dr Umar
description: Delhi blast probe: The prime accused, Dr Mohammad Umar Un Nabi, the suicide bomber in the November 10 Red Fort blast, stayed in a rented room in Haryana's Nuh for about ten days before the explosion.

Title: Mumbai CNG crisis: Can city's crippled transport system recover by Tuesday?
description: Mumbai CNG crisis: The crisis was caused by a complete stoppage of supply at the CGS Wadala facility, which feeds directly into MGL's pipeline network.

Title: Navi Mumbai International Airport to begin commercial ops from December 25
description: The inauguration, by Prime Minister Narendra Modi on October 8, set the stage for a carefully phased operational rollout, prioritising passenger safety, reliability, and comfort from day one at Navi Mumbai International Airport.

Title: Chennai braces for unsettled weather by weekend; yellow alert issued in multiple Tamil Nadu districts
description: Tamil Nadu weather: According to the IMD’s forecast light to moderate rain is expected on Tuesday at many places in Tamil Nadu as well as the Puducherry and Karaikal regions. Thunderstorms accompanied by lightning may also occur in parts of the state.

Title: Delhi Red Fort blast case: ED targets 25 Al Falah University-linked premises in shell company crackdown
description: A detailed examination has allegedly revealed multiple red flags consistent with shell-company operations. These include a lack of physical presence at declared business addresses, common contact details across various companies, an absence of statutory filings like EPFO and ESIC, overlapping directors and minimal salary disbursal through banking channels.

Title: Maharashtra weather: Below-normal temperatures in Mumbai as cold wave grips state’s interior
description: Authorities are advising citizens in the affected districts to wear warm clothing and to take special care of vulnerable community members as the severe cold conditions are likely to persist.

Title: Newborn, doctor among 4 killed as ambulance catches fire in Gujarat
description: The blaze erupted in the ambulance on Modasa-Dhansura road at around 1 am when the one-day-old boy, who was sick after birth, was being taken to a private hospital in Ahmedabad from a Modasa-based hospital for further treatment, police inspector DB Vala said.

Title: Mumbai CNG issue strands commuters as pipeline rupture halts transport
description: The crisis began on Sunday when a key pipeline operated by GAIL, located within the RCF premises in Trombay, was damaged.

Title: Hyderabad’s iconic biryani chains under scanner: I-T raids 30 locations over suspected tax evasion
description: Pista House, one of Hyderabad’s most famous food brands, was also a key focus of the operation.

Title: Hyderabad to see week-long chill; IMD issues cold wave alert for 5 Telangana districts
description: Meteorological analysis from the report indicated that minimum temperatures at a few locations remained significantly below normal.

Title: Watch: Knife-wielding man charges at cab drivers at Bengaluru airport; swift CISF action foils attack
description: The incident took place near the Terminal 1 arrival area. According to police, eyewitness accounts and CCTV footage showed Ahmed running towards the two taxi drivers while holding a long knife.

Title: Rabies scare grips Gorakhpur village after dog bite kills cow, 'contaminates' temple prasad
description: For four days, more than a hundred residents of Ramdeeh village have been flocking to a local health centre in a state of alarm.

Title: Delhi AQI: Capital’s air quality remains 'very poor’, Ghaziabad becomes India's most polluted city
description: According to data from the Central Pollution Control Board's (CPCB) Sameer app, Delhi’s overall Air Quality Index (AQI) was recorded at 341 at 6 am.

Title: Delhi blast probe: UP ATS examines Dr Shaheen, Dr Parvez’s Saudi, Maldives, Turkey links
description: The international itineraries of Dr Shaheen Shahid and Dr Parvez are being treated as a critical lead in unravelling the radical network they are alleged to be part of.

Title: Nainital’s Haldwani tense after mob vandalises shops over rumour of animal remains near temple
description: According to the police, a crowd gathered in Banbhulpura on Sunday night after word spread on social media about the alleged discovery of animal remains.
